TensorFlow.name: TensorFlow
TensorFlow.description: TensorFlow is an open-source library for machine learning available at https://github.com/tensorflow that provides powerful tools to develop, train, and deploy intelligent models.

OnnxRuntime.name: ONNX Runtime
OnnxRuntime.description: ONNX Runtime is a fast and flexible library for executing machine learning models across different platforms, designed as an opensource tool to enhance performance and interoperability.

SDL.name: SDL
SDL.description: SDL is a library that provides low-level access to audio, keyboard, mouse, joystick, and graphics hardware via OpenGL and Direct3D, enabling developers to create interactive multimedia applications across multiple platforms.

Glfw.name: GLFW
Glfw.description: GLFW is a library designed to create and manage windows, handle inputs, and facilitate OpenGL context creation for developing interactive graphics applications.

Assimp.name: Assimp
Assimp.description: Loads 40+ 3D-file-formats into one unified and clean data structure.

P5Palette.name: p5.palette
P5Palette.description: The p5.palette library is a tool for managing and applying color palettes in p5.js projects

P5Xr.name: p5.xr
P5Xr.description: p5.xr is an open-source library that enables augmented reality and virtual reality experiences within the p5.js framework

P5Js.name: p5.js
P5Js.description: The p5.warp library is an open-source tool available at github.com/davepagurek/p5.warp that enables dynamic manipulation of 3D graphics through warping effects within the p5.js environment.

P5VideoKit.name: p5videoKit
P5VideoKit.description: p5videoKit is an open-source library designed to simplify the integration and manipulation of video elements within p5.js sketches

P5Bezier.name: p5.bezier
P5Bezier.description: The p5.bezier library is an open-source tool for creating and manipulating vector graphics through Bezier curves, enhancing the p5.js environment with precise control over complex shapes.

P5Sound.name: p5.sound
P5Sound.description: The p5.sound library provides a set of tools for generating, manipulating, and analyzing sound, enabling interactive audio experiences within visual programming projects.

P5Brush.name: p5.brush
P5Brush.description: Extend the drawing capabilities of p5.js by introducing a rich set of tools that allow for the creation of dynamic and customizable brushes, vector-fields, and fill modes

TurtleGFX.name: TurtleGFX
TurtleGFX.description: TurtleGFX is an open-source library that enables users to create vector graphics through programmable turtle graphics commands.

P5Csg.name: p5.csg
P5Csg.description: p5.csg is an open-source library for 3D graphics that enables the creation and manipulation of complex shapes through constructive solid geometry

P5FilterRenderer.name: p5.filterRenderer
P5FilterRenderer.description: The library p5.filterRenderer provides tools for applying customizable filters to 3D graphics within the p5.js environment

TotalSerialism.name: Total Serialism
TotalSerialism.description: Total Serialism is an open-source library available at github.com/tmhglnd/total-serialism that provides structured tools for algorithmic composition by systematically organizing musical parameters such as pitch, duration, dynamics, and timbre.

P5_5.name: p5.5
P5_5.description: p5.5 is an open source library that provides a user interface toolkit designed to simplify the creation and management of interactive graphical elements.

P5Play.name: p5play
P5Play.description: p5play is a library that extends the p5.js framework with tools for creating interactive games and animations.

P5Anaglyph.name: p5.anaglyph
P5Anaglyph.description: Library for creating 3D (anaglyph) scenes and images using red/cyan glasses. Uses Dubois anaglyph algorithm & color matrices.

P5Warp.name: p5.warp
P5Warp.description: The p5.warp library is an open-source tool available at github.com/davepagurek/p5.warp that enables dynamic manipulation of 3D graphics through warping effects within the p5.js environment

P5TouchGui.name: p5.touchgui
P5TouchGui.description: The p5.touchgui library is an open-source user interface tool designed to simplify the creation of interactive controls in p5.js projects.

P5ModButton.name: p5.ModButton
P5ModButton.description: p5.ModButton is an open-source library that provides customizable UI buttons for interactive projects, enhancing user input handling within the p5.js framework

Numero.name: Número
Numero.description: Número is an open-source library designed to simplify the generation and manipulation of numerical data in programming

P5Dom.name: p5.dom
P5Dom.description: Provides tools to interact with HTML elements like sliders, buttons, and inputs within p5.js sketches.

P5Mapper.name: p5.mapper
P5Mapper.description: The p5.mapper library is an open-source tool designed for projection mapping that allows users to easily create and manipulate geometric shapes and surfaces within the p5.js environment.

P5UiRenderer.name: P5UIRenderer
P5UiRenderer.description: P5UIRenderer is an open-source library that provides a set of tools for creating and managing user interface elements in p5.js, enabling developers to design interactive visual components efficiently.

P5Grid.name: p5Grid
P5Grid.description: An implementation of highly flexible triangle, square, hexagon, and octagon girds for p5.js.

canvasGUI.name: CanvasGUI
canvasGUI.description: CanvasGUI is an open-source library that provides a flexible and customizable user interface for graphical applications.

C2Js.name: c2.js
C2Js.description: c2.js is a JavaScript library for creative coding based on computational geometry, physics simulation, evolutionary algorithms, and other modules.

P5Transparency.name: p5.transparency
P5Transparency.description: p5.transparency is an open-source library that enhances 3D graphics in p5.js by providing advanced tools for handling transparency and rendering overlapping transparent objects accurately.

P5CMyK.name: p5.cmyk.js
P5CMyK.description: The p5.cmyk.js library is an open-source tool that extends color capabilities in p5.js by enabling the use of CMYK color models for more advanced and precise color manipulation

TurtleGraphicsP5Js.name: turtle-graphics
TurtleGraphicsP5Js.description: The turtle-graphics library is an open-source tool for creating vector graphics programmatically

P5Quadrille.name: p5.quadrille.js
P5Quadrille.description: p5.quadrille.js is an open-source library that provides tools for creating and manipulating grid-based layouts and data structures within the p5.js environment.

P5Polar.name: p5.polar
P5Polar.description: p5.polar is an open-source library that extends vector graphics capabilities by providing tools for creating and manipulating polar coordinate-based shapes and animations

XYScopeJs.name: XYScope.js
XYScopeJs.description: XYscope.js converts the coordinates of primitive shapes to audio waveforms which are sent to an analog display in XY-mode (such as an oscilloscope), revealing their vector graphic forms.

P5FillGradient.name: p5.fillGradient
P5FillGradient.description: Fill shapes in p5.js with Linear, Radial and Conic Gradients. p5.fillGradient enables shape filling with Linear, Radial and Conic Gradients instead of plain colours in your p5.js sketch.

P5Grain.name: p5.grain
P5Grain.description: The p5.grain library is an open-source tool designed to add noise and granular textures to visual projects using the p5.js framework, enhancing detail and atmosphere.

P5simpleAR.name: p5.simpleAR
P5simpleAR.description: p5.simpleAR is a library designed to integrate augmented reality features into projects, offering simple tools for detecting markers and overlaying digital content.

OrxOlive.name: orx-olive
OrxOlive.description: Provides live coding functionality: updates a running OPENRNDR program when you save your changes.

OrxSvg.name: orx-svg

OrxObjLoader.name: orx-obj-loader
OrxObjLoader.description: Simple loader and saver for Wavefront .obj 3D mesh files.

OrxIntervalTree.name: orx-interval-tree
OrxIntervalTree.description: Efficient data structures for managing and querying intervals.

OrxTurtle.name: orx-turtle
OrxTurtle.description: Bezier backed turtle graphics for OPENRNDR programs.

OrxKdtree.name: orx-kdtree
OrxKdtree.description: Fast search of points closest to the queried point in a data set. 2D, 3D and 4D.

OrxExpressionEvaluator.name: orx-expression-evaluator
OrxExpressionEvaluator.description: Tools to evaluate strings containing mathematical expressions.

OrxPalette.name: orx-palette
OrxPalette.description: Collections of color palettes and tools for interacting with them.

OrxTextWriter.name: orx-text-writer

OrxFx.name: orx-fx

OrxMarchingSquares.name: orx-marching-squares

OrxQuadTree.name: orx-quadtree
OrxQuadTree.description: Implementation of the quadtree structure and tools for querying points.

OrxShadeStyles.name: orx-shade-styles
OrxShadeStyles.description: Shader based fills and strokes, including various types of gradient fills.

OrxHashGrid.name: orx-hash-grid
OrxHashGrid.description: 2D space partitioning for fast point queries.

OrxGradientDescent.name: orx-gradient-descent
OrxGradientDescent.description: Finds equation inputs that output a minimum value: easy to use gradient descent based minimizer.

OrxBoofCv.name: orx-boofcv

OrxColor.name: orx-color
OrxColor.description: Provides OPENRNDR programs with color spaces, palettes, histograms, and named colors.

OrxOsc.name: orx-osc
OrxOsc.description: Provides OSC support for OPENRNDR programs.

OrxFcurve.name: orx-fcurve
OrxFcurve.description: Advanced keyframing tools based on 1-dimensional Bezier curves

OrxPoissonFill.name: orx-poisson-fill
OrxPoissonFill.description: Post processing effect that fills transparent parts of the image interpolating the edge pixel colors.

OrxTriangulation.name: orx-triangulation
OrxTriangulation.description: Delaunay triangulation and Voronoi diagrams for OPENRNDR programs

OrxShaderPhrases.name: orx-shader-phrases
OrxShaderPhrases.description: A library of shader phrases that can be composed into shaders

OrxMeshNoise.name: orx-mesh-noise
OrxMeshNoise.description: Generate random samples on the surface of a mesh

OrxShapes.name: orx-shapes
OrxShapes.description: Collection of 2D shape generators and modifiers.

OrxImageFit.name: orx-image-fit
OrxImageFit.description: Draws an image ensuring it fits or covers the specified Rectangle.

OrxJumpflood.name: orx-jumpflood
OrxJumpflood.description: Calculates distance or direction fields from an image. GPU accelerated, 2D.

OrxCompositor.name: orx-compositor
OrxCompositor.description: Toolkit to make composite (layered) images using blend modes and filters in OPENRNDR programs

OrxFft.name: orx-fft
OrxFft.description: Simple forward and inverse FFT routines

OpenrndrVideo.name: openrndr-ffmpeg

OrxEnvelopes.name: orx-envelopes
OrxEnvelopes.description: Provides ADSR (Attack, Decay, Sustain, Release) envelopes and tools for OPENRNDR programs

OrxCamera.name: orx-camera
OrxCamera.description: Provides OPENRNDR programs with 2D and 3D cameras controllable via mouse and keyboard.

OrxMidi.name: orx-midi
OrxMidi.description: MIDI support for keyboards and controllers. Send and receive note and control change events. Bind inputs to variables.

OPENRNDR.name: OPENRNDR
OPENRNDR.description: OPENRNDR is an open-source library designed to facilitate expressive visual programming and interactive graphics development with ease and flexibility in creative coding.

OrxIntegralImage.name: orx-integral-image
OrxIntegralImage.description: CPU and GPU-based implementation for integral images (summed area tables)

OrxTextOnContour.name: orx-text-on-contour
OrxTextOnContour.description: The orx-text-on-contour library is an opensource tool that enables precise rendering of typography along custom paths, enhancing graphical compositions with dynamic text alignment.

OrxEasing.name: orx-easing
OrxEasing.description: Easing functions for smooth animation or non-linear interpolation.

OrxNoise.name: orx-noise
OrxNoise.description: Randomness for every type of person: Perlin, uniform, value, simplex, fractal and many other types of noise.

AntlrKotlin.name: antlr-kotlin
AntlrKotlin.description: Antlr-kotlin is an open-source library designed for parsing that enables developers to generate parsers in Kotlin, facilitating the interpretation and transformation of complex text inputs.

KotlinxSerialization.name: kotlinx.serialization
KotlinxSerialization.description: The library kotlinx.serialization is an open-source tool that enables efficient encoding and decoding of data structures in Kotlin, facilitating smooth data handling and interchange.

KotlinCsv.name: kotlin-csv
KotlinCsv.description: The kotlin-csv library is an open-source tool designed to efficiently read and write CSV files in Kotlin, facilitating seamless data manipulation and integration in various programming projects.

TensorflowJs.name: tensorflow.js
TensorflowJs.description: TensorFlow.js is an open-source library that enables machine learning directly in JavaScript environments, allowing developers to create intelligent, interactive applications with ease.

Ml5Js.name: ml5.js
Ml5Js.description: Ml5.js is an open-source library that provides accessible machine learning tools for artists and developers, enabling easy integration of advanced models into interactive projects.

DeepJavaLibrary.name: Deep Java Library
DeepJavaLibrary.description: Deep Java Library provides a collection of easy-to-use tools for building, training, and deploying machine learning models directly in Java, supporting frameworks like PyTorch and TensorFlow

JSerialComm.name: JSerialComm
JSerialComm.description: JSerialComm is an open-source library available on GitHub that provides a simple and efficient binding for serial port communication in Java, enabling seamless interaction with hardware devices.

BoofCV.name: BoofCV
BoofCV.description: BoofCV is a library that provides advanced computer vision tools for image processing, feature detection, and real-time analysis, supporting developers in building interactive visual applications.

Antlr.name: Antlr
Antlr.description: Antlr is an open-source library designed for parsing and processing structured text, enabling developers to efficiently generate parsers for interpreting complex languages and data formats.

JavaxSound.name: javax.sound
JavaxSound.description: The javax.sound library provides a set of tools for handling audio capture, processing, and playback, enabling precise control over sound input and output in Java applications.

Jogl.name: JOGL
Jogl.description: JOGL is an open-source library that provides Java bindings to the OpenGL graphics API, enabling developers to create high-performance, hardware-accelerated 2D and 3D graphics applications.

Artnet4J.name: Artnet4J
Artnet4J.description: Artnet4J is an open-source Java library designed for sending and receiving Art-Net protocol data, enabling developers to control lighting systems and DMX devices efficiently.

Lwjgl.name: Lightweight Java Game library
Lwjgl.description: The Lightweight Java Game Library is an open-source library that provides Java bindings to low-level graphics, audio, and input APIs, enabling efficient development of interactive visual applications.

Java.name: Java
Java.description: Java is a versatile language that provides a rich set of libraries and frameworks, enabling the development of dynamic visual and interactive applications through its efficient and open-source tools.

Awt.name: AWT
Awt.description: The Abstract Window Toolkit library provides a set of user interface components and tools for creating graphical applications that manage windows, handle events, and draw graphics.

JavaCv.name: JavaCV
JavaCv.description: avaCV is a library that provides a comprehensive set of computer vision and image processing tools for Java applications.

Jts.name: JTS Topology Suite
Jts.description: JTS Topology Suite is an open-source library that provides advanced geometry and GIS tools for spatial data processing and analysis.

TensorFlowJava.name: TensorFlow for Java
TensorFlowJava.description: TensorFlow for Java is a powerful library that enables developers to build and deploy machine learning models within Java applications, offering efficient tools for numerical computation and dataflow programming as detailed at the official GitHub repository tensorflow/java.

Swing.name: Swing
Swing.description: Swing is a library in Java that provides a set of ui components for building graphical user interfaces with customizable features and a consistent look across platforms.

JavaOsc.name: JavaOsc
JavaOsc.description: JavaOsc is an open-source library available at github.com/hoijui/JavaOSC that provides a simple and efficient way to send and receive OSC messages within Java applications.

Zip.name: zip
Zip.description: Zip is a file format that uses compression to reduce the size of one or more files, making storage and transfer more efficient.

Mp4.name: MP4
Mp4.description: MP4 is a file format designed for storing digital video and audio streams efficiently, supporting features such as multiple tracks and metadata for versatile multimedia applications.

Fbx.name: Filmbox
Fbx.description: Filmbox is a file format designed for 3D graphics that enables the exchange and storage of complex animated models and scenes between different software applications.

Obj.name: Wavefront OBJ
Obj.description: The Wavefront OBJ file format is a widely used standard in 3D graphics that stores geometric data such as vertices, faces, and textures to represent three-dimensional models for use in various digital applications.

Ogg.name: OGG
Ogg.description: Ogg is a free, open file format designed for efficient streaming and manipulation of high-quality audio data.

Mov.name: Quicktime MOV
Mov.description: he QuickTime MOV file format is a multimedia container developed by Apple that supports storing video, audio, and text tracks in a single file, enabling flexible editing and playback.

Html.name: HTML
Html.description: HTML is a file format used to structure and present content on the web, providing a standard way to create and organize elements such as text, images, and multimedia.

Collada.name: Collada
Collada.description: Collada is an open standard file format used to store and exchange 3D graphics data, enabling interoperability between different software tools and platforms.

Usd.name: USD
Usd.description: USD is an open-source file format developed by Pixar for 3D graphics that enables the efficient interchange, composition, and collaboration of complex digital content across different software tools.

Svg.name: SVG
Svg.description: SVG is a file format that uses vector graphics to create and manipulate scalable, resolution-independent images through a structured XML-based language.

Css.name: CSS
Css.description: CSS is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in a markup language, typically saved in a file format that defines the look and formatting of text and other elements.

Xml.name: XML
Xml.description: XML is a file format designed to store and transport structured data in a readable and self-descriptive way, as detailed on Wikipedia.

Csv.name: CSV
Csv.description: The CSV file format is a simple and widely used method for storing structured data in plain text, where each line represents a data record and fields are separated by commas.

Opus.name: Opus
Opus.description: Opus is an open, royalty-free audio file format designed for high-quality and low-latency audio compression, suitable for interactive applications and real-time communication.

Png.name: PNG
Png.description: PNG is a file format for raster graphics that supports lossless compression and transparency, widely used for creating high-quality images in various digital projects.

Onnx.name: ONNX
Onnx.description: ONNX is an open file format and standard for representing machine learning models, enabling interoperability between different frameworks.

Jpg.name: JPEG
Jpg.description: JPEG is a widely used file format for compressing raster graphics images by reducing their file size through lossy compression techniques.

Ply.name: PLY
Ply.description: PLY is a file format used in 3D graphics to store three-dimensional data, supporting detailed descriptions of the geometry and properties of objects

Gif.name: GIF
Gif.description: The GIF is a file format that supports raster graphics and enables simple animations by displaying a sequence of images within a single file.

Json.name: JSON
Json.description: JSON is a file format used to represent structured data in a readable and organized way, enabling efficient data exchange and manipulation.

Wav.name: WAV
Wav.description: WAV is a file format that stores uncompressed audio data, commonly used for high-quality sound representation and editing.

Gltf.name: GLTF
Gltf.description: GLTF is a file format designed for efficiently transmitting and loading 3D graphics models and scenes in applications requiring fast and interoperable rendering.

Mp3.name: MP3
Mp3.description: MP3 is a popular file format for audio that compresses sound data to reduce file size while maintaining quality, enabling efficient storage and playback.

Stl.name: STL
Stl.description: The STL file format is a widely used standard in 3D graphics for representing the surface geometry of three-dimensional objects through a collection of triangular facets.

Gzip.name: gzip
Gzip.description: Gzip is a file format and compression tool used to reduce the size of files by encoding data more efficiently, enabling faster storage and transfer.

Udp.name: UDP
Udp.description: UDP is a communication protocol that enables fast, connectionless transmission of data packets between devices with minimal overhead.

Http.name: HTTP
Http.description: HTTP is a protocol designed for transferring data efficiently and reliably between devices over a network, enabling the exchange of various types of content in creative coding projects.

Https.name: HTTPS
Https.description: The HTTPS protocol is a secure communication tool that uses encryption to protect data exchanged between devices, ensuring privacy and integrity.

ArtNet.name: ArtNet
ArtNet.description: ArtNet is a protocol designed to transmit lighting control data over Ethernet networks, enabling the seamless management of complex lighting systems in artistic and performance environments.

WebSocket.name: WebSocket
WebSocket.description: WebSocket is a protocol that enables interactive, real-time communication between a client and a server by establishing a persistent, full-duplex connection.

Tcp.name: TCP
Tcp.description: The Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) is a reliable communication protocol that ensures ordered and error-checked delivery of data between devices over a network, enabling stable and consistent data exchange."

OSC.name: OSC
OSC.description: Open Sound Control (OSC) is a standard network protocol used as a device interface to communicate and control multimedia systems with high precision and flexibility.

Tramontana.name: Tramontana
Tramontana.description: Provides access to phone sensors for AR/VR-like interactions.

CreativeMachine.name: Creative Machine
CreativeMachine.description: Creative Machine is a library that utilizes machine learning techniques to generate and manipulate digital content programmatically

Geomerative.name: Geomerative
Geomerative.description: Accesses vertex points of vector graphics or text for manipulation.

ControlP5.name: ControlP5
ControlP5.description: A versatile UI library for creating buttons, sliders, and knobs.

Queasycam.name: Queasycame
Queasycam.description: Provides first-person camera controls in 3D spaces.

Nub.name: nub
Nub.description: a simple, expressive, language-agnostic, and extensible visual computing library, featuring interaction, visualization and animation frameworks and supporting advanced (onscreen/offscreen) rendering techniques

Ani.name: Ani
Ani.description: Ani is a Processing library that provides precise control over animation timing and easing functions to create smooth and customizable motion effects.

ProcessingGeometrySuite.name: Processing Geometry Suite
ProcessingGeometrySuite.description: The Processing Geometry Suite is a library that provides a collection of geometry tools for creating, manipulating, and analyzing shapes and spatial structures efficiently.

VideoExport.name: VideoExport
VideoExport.description: Allows exporting videos from Processing sketches using FFMPEG.

OscP5.name: OscP5
OscP5.description: Facilitates Open Sound Control (OSC) communication with external devices.

GifAnimation.name: GifAnimation
GifAnimation.description: Enables exporting animated GIFs from sketches.

Processing.name: Processing
Processing.description: Processing is an open-source application and library designed for creative coding that provides a flexible software sketchbook and a development environment for visual arts and interactive media.

D3Contour.name: d3-contour
D3Contour.description: D3-contour is an open-source library that generates geometric contour lines from gridded data to visualize continuous fields

D3Color.name: d3-color
D3Color.description: The d3-color library is an open-source tool that provides robust methods for color manipulation and conversion, enabling precise control over color spaces and transformations in digital projects.

D3Ease.name: d3-ease
D3Ease.description: The d3-ease library is an open-source tool that provides a collection of mathematical easing functions to create smooth and visually appealing animations.

D3JS.name: d3
D3JS.description: D3 is an open-source library for web that enables efficient manipulation of documents based on data to create dynamic, interactive visualizations.

D3QuadTree.name: d3-quadtree
D3QuadTree.description: The d3-quadtree library is an open source tool for efficient space partitioning that enables fast searching, insertion, and retrieval of two-dimensional points, complementing other data visualization tools like d3-contour.

D3Force.name: d3-force
D3Force.description: D3-force is an open-source library that provides a flexible simulation framework for modeling physical forces on nodes and links, enabling dynamic and interactive visualizations.

CPP.name: C++
CPP.description: C++ language offers powerful features such as object-oriented programming, low-level memory manipulation, and extensive libraries that enable developers to create complex, high-performance visual and interactive applications.

Ktor.name: Ktor
Ktor.description: Ktor offers a flexible and lightweight framework for building asynchronous servers and clients in Kotlin, facilitating efficient and expressive development.

Overtone.name: Overtone
Overtone.description: Open source audio environment designed to explore new musical ideas from synthesis and sampling to instrument building, live-coding and collaborative jamming.

Esp32.name: ESP32
Esp32.description: The ESP32 is a versatile hardware microcontroller known for its integrated Wi-Fi and Bluetooth capabilities, enabling innovative interactive projects that combine computing power with real-world sensor data.

Javascript.name: Javascript
Javascript.description: JavaScript is a versatile, open-source programming language widely used in web environments to create interactive visual and multimedia experiences.

LaserLightingDisplay.name: Laser lighting display
LaserLightingDisplay.description: Laser lighting displays are media technology hardware systems that use laser beams to create dynamic visual patterns and effects by precisely controlling light emission and direction.

SonicPi.name: Sonic Pi
SonicPi.description: Sonic Pi is an open-source application designed for live coding that enables users to create and manipulate audio through programming.

Angle.name: Angle
Angle.description: ANGLE is a library that translates graphics API calls from OpenGL ES to other platform-specific APIs to enable cross-platform graphics rendering.

DepthSensor.name: Depth sensor
DepthSensor.description: A depth sensor is a media technology hardware device that captures spatial information by measuring the distance between the sensor and objects in its environment, enabling the creation of three-dimensional data for interactive applications.

Browser.name: Browser
Browser.description: An application designed to retrieve, present, and navigate web content, enabling users to interact with various online resources seamlessly.

Unity.name: Unity
Unity.description: Unity is a versatile game development platform that provides a comprehensive set of tools for designing, programming, and deploying interactive 2D and 3D content across multiple devices and operating systems.

Inkscape.name: Inkscape
Inkscape.description: Inkscape is an open-source application for creating and editing vector graphics, offering a variety of tools for drawing, shaping, and manipulating paths and objects with precision.

OpenGL.name: OpenGL
OpenGL.description: OpenGL is a library and graphics API that provides a standardized interface for rendering 2D and 3D vector graphics efficiently on various hardware platforms.

PaperJs.name: Paper.js
PaperJs.description: Paper.js is an open-source web library designed for vector graphics scripting that enables efficient and intuitive drawing and animation on the HTML5 canvas.

Ffmpeg.name: FFmpeg
Ffmpeg.description: FFmpeg is an open-source command-line application and library that enables the processing, conversion, and streaming of video and audio files.

WebGPU.name: WebGPU
WebGPU.description: WebGPU is a modern graphics API library designed to provide high-performance, low-level access to GPU capabilities for advanced rendering and computation within the web environment.

OpenGL_ES.name: OpenGL ES
OpenGL_ES.description: OpenGL ES is a lightweight graphics API library designed for rendering 2D and 3D graphics efficiently on embedded systems and mobile devices, enabling developers to create visually interactive applications.

Microphone.name: Microphone
Microphone.description: A microphone is a hardware device in media technology that converts sound waves into electrical signals for audio input and processing.

Cinder.name: Cinder
Cinder.description: Cinder is an open-source library designed to provide a powerful and intuitive framework for artists and developers to create visually rich and interactive applications in creative coding.

Kotlin.name: Kotlin
Kotlin.description: Kotlin is an open-source language designed for concise and expressive programming, offering robust support for developing interactive and visually engaging applications with modern features and seamless interoperability.

CSharp.name: C#
CSharp.description: C# is a versatile language designed by Microsoft that enables developers to create interactive graphics and animations through its rich libraries and frameworks, supporting both object-oriented and component-oriented programming.

HLSL.name: HLSL
HLSL.description: HLSL is a language used to write shaders that control the rendering of graphics by defining how light and color interact with 3D models on the GPU.

TouchDesigner.name: TouchDesigner
TouchDesigner.description: TouchDesigner is a node-based application used for real-time interactive multimedia content creation and visual programming.

Nodebox.name: Nodebox
Nodebox.description: Nodebox is an open-source application that provides a node-based interface for creating visual compositions and generative graphics efficiently.

Vulkan.name: Vulkan
Vulkan.description: Vulkan is a low-overhead, cross-platform graphics API and library designed to provide high-efficiency access to modern GPUs for rendering complex visuals and performing parallel computations in creative coding projects.

PenPlotter.name: Pen plotter
PenPlotter.description: A pen plotter is a hardware media technology device that creates precise printed drawings by moving a pen over the surface, translating digital vector graphics into detailed physical prints.

Display.name: Display
Display.description: Display tools are hardware devices used as media technology to visually present information, images, or video through various screen types such as LCD, LED, or OLED.

Max.name: Max
Max.description: Max is a node-based application designed for music and multimedia creation that allows users to visually program interactive audio, video, and graphical projects.

Nannou.name: Nannou
Nannou.description: Nannou is an open-source library designed to provide simple, expressive, and powerful tools for creative coding in Rust, enabling artists and developers to build interactive graphics, audio, and multimedia applications.

IntelliJ.name: IntelliJ IDEA
IntelliJ.description: IntelliJ IDEA is an application and integrated development environment that provides advanced coding assistance, debugging, and project management features to enhance the development of innovative and expressive software projects.

Illustrator.name: Adobe Illustrator
Illustrator.description: Adobe Illustrator is an application used for creating and editing vector graphics with precision and scalability, enabling artists and designers to produce detailed digital artwork.

Camera.name: Photo camera
Camera.description: The photo camera is a media technology device that uses a sensor and specialized hardware to capture and record visual images digitally.

Gimp.name: Gimp
Gimp.description: GIMP is an open-source application designed for creating and editing raster graphics, offering a wide range of tools for image manipulation, digital painting, and graphic design.

DMX.name: DMX
DMX.description: DMX is a standard device interface protocol used to control lighting and effects equipment by sending digital signals to manage intensity, color, and movement.

GLSL.name: GLSL
GLSL.description: GLSL is a language designed for writing shaders, which are programs that run on graphics hardware to control the rendering of images, enabling developers to create dynamic visual effects and complex graphics.

OpenFrameworks.name: OpenFrameworks
OpenFrameworks.description: OpenFrameworks is an open-source C++ toolkit designed to facilitate creative coding by providing a simple and efficient framework for multimedia applications involving graphics, audio, and interaction.

Tic80.name: TIC-80
Tic80.description: TIC-80 is a fantasy console that provides an integrated development environment with built-in tools for coding, graphics, sound, and game design, enabling users to create and share small-scale retro-style games.

SuperCollider.name: SuperCollider
SuperCollider.description: SuperCollider is an open-source application designed for audio synthesis and algorithmic composition, widely used in live coding to create and manipulate sound in real-time.

Ruby.name: Ruby
Ruby.description: Ruby is an opensource programming language known for its simplicity and flexibility, making it a powerful tool for developing interactive and artistic software projects.

OpenProcessing.name: OpenProcessing
OpenProcessing.description: OpenProcessing is a platform that offers a variety of tools for creative coding, enabling users to write, share, and explore interactive visual programming projects in a collaborative environment.

WebGL.name: WebGL
WebGL.description: WebGL is a graphics API library that enables the rendering of interactive 3D and 2D graphics within web environments using hardware-accelerated capabilities

Sox.name: Sox
Sox.description: SoX is an open-source command-line application designed for audio processing, allowing users to convert, filter, and manipulate sound files efficiently.

Cinema4D.name: Cinema 4D
Cinema4D.description: Cinema 4D is an application for 3d graphics that provides a comprehensive suite of tools for modeling, animation, rendering, and texturing, enabling users to create complex visual scenes with precision and efficiency.

Pico8.name: Pico-8
Pico8.description: PICO-8 is a fantasy console that provides a compact and accessible environment for creating, sharing, and playing small retro-style video games using a built-in code editor, sprite editor, sound editor, and music tracker.

ThreeJS.name: Three.js
ThreeJS.description: Three.js is an open-source library for the web that facilitates the creation and rendering of 3D graphics, enabling artists and developers to explore interactive visual experiences in the field of creative coding.

Blender.name: Blender
Blender.description: Blender is an open-source application for creating and manipulating 3D graphics, offering a comprehensive suite of tools for modeling, animation, rendering, and scripting.

UnrealEngine.name: Unreal Engine
UnrealEngine.description: Unreal Engine is a powerful suite of tools designed for game development, offering advanced real-time 3D rendering, physics simulation, and scripting capabilities to create interactive and visually immersive digital experiences.

PureData.name: PureData
PureData.description: Pure Data is an open-source, node-based application designed for real-time audio, video, and graphical processing, enabling users to create interactive multimedia projects through visual programming.

VSCode.name: Visual Studio Code
VSCode.description: Visual Studio Code is an open-source application and integrated development environment that provides a versatile platform with extensive language support and customizable features, enabling efficient coding and project management.

ShaderToy.name: ShaderToy
ShaderToy.description: ShaderToy is a web platform and software that enables users to create, share, and explore real-time shaders through an interactive environment designed for developing and visualizing graphical effects.

Picotron.name: Picotron
Picotron.description: Picotron is a fantasy console designed to provide a compact, integrated environment for developing and running pixel-art games and interactive programs efficiently.

TidalCycles.name: TidalCycles
TidalCycles.description: Live coding language embedded in Haskell, ideal for rhythm-based music and pattern generation.

MediaPlayer.name: Media player
MediaPlayer.description: The Media Player tool integrates media technology and hardware to enable seamless playback, control, and manipulation of audio and video files within interactive digital projects.

ImageMagick.name: ImageMagick
ImageMagick.description: ImageMagick is an opensource application that provides command-line tools to create, edit, compose, and convert both raster graphics and vector graphics efficiently.

Hydra.name: Hydra
Hydra.description: Hydra is an open-source platform that enables real-time generation and manipulation of shaders for visual performances and interactive coding

Arduino.name: Arduino
Arduino.description: Arduino is an open-source hardware platform featuring a microcontroller that enables users to develop interactive applications through programmable electronic components.

Lua.name: Lua
Lua.description: Lua language is a lightweight, high-level programming language designed for embedded use, offering fast performance and easy integration for developing interactive and dynamic applications.

FoxDot.name: FoxDot
FoxDot.description: FoxDot is an open-source application for live coding that enables users to create and manipulate audio in real-time

MidiKeyboard.name: MIDI Keyboard
MidiKeyboard.description: A MIDI keyboard is a hardware media technology device that allows users to input and control musical notes and parameters electronically for digital sound production and manipulation.

Projector.name: Projector
Projector.description: The projector is a hardware media technology device that displays images or videos onto a surface by shining light through a small transparent lens system.

Printer.name: Printer
Printer.description: The printer is a hardware device in media technology that produces physical copies by transferring text and images onto paper through various print mechanisms.

Photoshop.name: Adobe Photoshop
Photoshop.description: Adobe Photoshop is an application designed for creating and editing raster graphics through a wide range of tools and features that allow users to manipulate images with precision and creativity.

VVVV.name: VVVV
VVVV.description: VVVV is a node-based application designed for real-time video synthesis and interactive media projects, enabling users to visually program complex multimedia installations and performances."

Rust.name: Rust
Rust.description: Rust is an open-source language designed for performance and safety that provides powerful tools for developing efficient and reliable visual and interactive applications.

MicroPython.name: MicroPython
MicroPython.description: MicroPython is an open-source language designed to run efficiently on microcontrollers, enabling developers to write compact, high-level code for hardware interaction and experimental digital projects.

CircuitPython.name: CircuitPython
CircuitPython.description: CircuitPython is an open-source language designed for microcontrollers that enables interactive and accessible programming for artistic and educational projects.

Godot.name: Godot
Godot.description: Godot is an open-source game development engine that provides a comprehensive set of tools for designing, coding, and deploying 2D and 3D interactive projects efficiently.

MidiController.name: MIDI Controller
MidiController.description: A MIDI controller is a hardware device used in media technology that sends MIDI signals to control and manipulate sound, visuals, or other digital media elements in real time.

Audacity.name: Audacity
Audacity.description: Audacity is an open-source application that provides versatile audio editing and recording tools, enabling users to manipulate sound files through features like multi-track mixing, effects, and waveform visualization.

C.name: C
C.description: The language C is a powerful, efficient, and widely-used programming language that provides low-level access to memory and simple language constructs, making it suitable for developing performance-critical applications and systems.

Midi.name: MIDI
Midi.description: MIDI is a standard device interface protocol that enables electronic instruments and computers to communicate and control musical performance data.

SonicVisualiser.name: Sonic Visualizer
SonicVisualiser.description: Sonic Visualiser is an open-source application designed for viewing and analyzing audio recordings, providing tools to examine sound waveforms, spectrograms, and annotations in detail.

Direct3D.name: Direct3D
Direct3D.description: Direct3D is a graphics API and library developed by Microsoft that enables developers to create and manage high-performance 3D graphics rendering within applications.

PyTorch.name: PyTorch
PyTorch.description: PyTorch is a library for machine learning that provides flexible tools for building and training neural networks with dynamic computation graphs and efficient tensor operations.

Pandas.name: Pandas
Pandas.description: Pandas is a powerful library designed for data science that provides flexible and efficient tools to manipulate, analyze, and visualize structured data with ease.

ScikitLearn.name: Scikit-learn
ScikitLearn.description: Scikit-learn is a powerful library designed for data science and machine learning that provides efficient tools for data analysis, model building, and validation.

Python.name: Python
Python.description: Python is an open source language known for its simplicity and versatility, widely used in artistic and generative projects to create visual and interactive works through numerous libraries and frameworks.

Transformers.name: Transformers
Transformers.description: The Transformers library is an open-source machine learning library that provides pre-trained models and tools for natural language processing and other tasks.

NumPy.name: NumPy
NumPy.description: NumPy is a powerful library that provides efficient numerical computing tools and multi-dimensional array objects essential for data manipulation and mathematical operations.
